function.name: firstDayOfYear
function.description: Returns the first day of the year.

function.name: firstDayOfMonth
function.description: Returns the first day of the month.

function.name: lastDayOfMonth
function.description: Returns the last day of the month.

function.name: changeISODateFormat
function.description:
Changes an ISO Date Format
Example: | EL Add Variable | date | $[date:changeISODateFormat('2013-05-06T04:46:22.000+08:00','yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.S')] |
=> date = 2013-05-06 04:46:22.0

function.name: parse
function.description:
Parse a date.
Example: Assumption that the date today is April 23, 2013 3:47 pm | Set Date Time Format | dd-MM-yyyy HH:mm:ss | | Print Date Time | | | ${dateSet}= | EL Evaluate | $[date:parse('2013-02-08', 'yyyy-MM-dd')] | # Recornize that the string passed is a date with this format yyyy-MM-dd | | Print Date Time | |
=> 23-04-2013 15:37:00 08-02-2013 00:00:00

function.name: toSQLDate
function.description:
Example: Assumption that the date today is Apr 23, 2013 3:47 pm | Set Date Time Format | yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss | | ${sqlDate}= | EL Evaluate | $[date:toSQLDate()] |
=>
2013-04-23

function.name: toSQLTime
function.description:
Example: Assumption that the date today is Apr 23, 2013 3:47 pm | Set Date Time Format | yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss | | ${sqlTime}= | EL Evaluate | $[date:toSQLTime()] |
=> 15:47:00

function.name: toSQLTimestamp
function.description:
Example: Assumption that the date today is Apr 23, 2013 3:47 pm | Set Date Time Format | yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss | | ${sqlTimestamp}= | EL Evaluate | $[date:toSQLTimestamp()] |
=> 2013-04-23 15:47:00

function.name: isBeforeNow
function.description:
Check if date passes is before date now.
Example: | EL Should Be True | $[date:isBeforeNow()] |

function.name: isoParse
function.description:
Parses an ISO date format to the set date time format.
Example : | EL Should Be Equal | $[date:isoParse('2013-03-18T15:39:43.000+08:00')] | 2013-03-18 15:39:43 |
